content:
Greetings! This is my research page.
I’m a Senior Research Scientist in machine learning at CSIRO (Australia’s national science agency) and an Adjunct Senior Research Fellow at Monash University. Previously, I obtained my PhD from Monash University and worked as a research fellow there.
I’m interested in developing machine learning methods (e.g., deep learning, probabilistic methods, LLMs) to address problems in science domains.
I serve as an Area Chair for NeurIPS and ICLR and I’m in the editorial board of Machine Learning Journal. I’m an IEEE Senior Member from 2026.
My paper won the Best Student Paper Award at KDD 2023.

title: He Zhao
